game.name: Jurassic Clans
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Jurassic Clans sets in a world where dinosaurs co-exist with humans. Ensure your people thrive in this dangerous world by surviving and evolving your tribe. Search for resources to expand your village, research technologies, defend your people from predators and prepare for the upcoming apocalypse.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jurassic Clans sets in a world where dinosaurs co-exist with humans. Ensure your people thrive in this dangerous world by surviving and evolving your tribe. Search for resources to expand your village, research technologies, defend your people from predators and prepare for the upcoming apocalypse.

reviewHighlights.text: Not a terrible game, but I can't recommend it. Overall the UI is fine, but the movement controls are horrible. Almost every turn I go to click on some...
Half a game, if that, plays like a steady beta build waiting for the next update - there's just not enough content here. The publisher's already pushe...
